title: Ruby Dee
summary: Ruby Dee (October 27, 1922 â€“ June 11, 2014) was an American actress, poet, playwright, screenwriter, journalist, and civil rights activist.[1] She originated the role of "Ruth Younger" in the stage and film versions of A Raisin in the Sun (1961).
